controller

Class BillController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.BillController

  • public final class BillController
extends java.lang.Object
    BillController is a controller class responsible for managing the view classes which operate with bills. Makes requests to the api. Gets data and sends it to views. Listens to views inputs an act accordingly.
